00022 inline static complex double csqr(complex double x)
00023 {
00024   return(x*x);
00025 }
00026 
00028 inline static complex double cpow3(complex double x)
00029 {
00030   return(x*x*x);
00031 }
00032 
00034 inline static complex double cpow32(complex double x)
00035 {
00036   return(x*csqrt(x));
00037 }
00038 
00040 inline static double vec3sqr(const double v[3])
00041 {
00042   return(v[0]*v[0]+v[1]*v[1]+v[2]*v[2]);
00043 }
00044 
00046 inline static complex double cvec3sqr(const complex double v[3])
00047 {
00048   return(v[0]*v[0]+v[1]*v[1]+v[2]*v[2]);
00049 }
00050 
00052 inline static double vec3mult(const double a[3],
00053                          const double b[3])
00054 {
00055   return(a[0]*b[0]+a[1]*b[1]+a[2]*b[2]);
00056 }
00057 
00059 inline static complex double cvec3mult(const complex double a[3], 
00060                          const complex double b[3])
00061 {
00062   return(a[0]*b[0]+a[1]*b[1]+a[2]*b[2]);
00063 }
00064 
00066 inline static void vec3cross(const double a[3],
00067                              const double b[3], double c[3])
00068 {
00069   c[0] = a[1]*b[2] - a[2]*b[1];
00070   c[1] = a[2]*b[0] - a[0]*b[2];
00071   c[2] = a[0]*b[1] - a[1]*b[0];
00072 }
00073 
00075 inline static void cvec3cross(const complex double a[3], 
00076                               const complex double b[3], complex double c[3])
00077 {
00078   c[0] = a[1]*b[2] - a[2]*b[1];
00079   c[1] = a[2]*b[0] - a[0]*b[2];
00080   c[2] = a[0]*b[1] - a[1]*b[0];
00081 }
00082 
00084 inline static double vec3spat(const double a[3],
00085                               const double b[3],
00086                               const double c[3])
00087 {
00088   return ((a[1]*b[2]-a[2]*b[1])*c[0] +
00089           (a[2]*b[0]-a[0]*b[2])*c[1] +
00090           (a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0])*c[2]);
00091 }
00092 
00094 inline static complex double cvec3spat(const complex double a[3], 
00095                                        const complex double b[3], 
00096                                        const complex double c[3])
00097 {
00098   return ((a[1]*b[2]-a[2]*b[1])*c[0] +
00099           (a[2]*b[0]-a[0]*b[2])*c[1] +
00100           (a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0])*c[2]);
00101 }
